Actions.Title: 注释
Actions.ActionName: 如果在用电池 且 没有显示百分比，则 显示百分比。

ElseActions.Title: 注释
ElseActions.ActionName: 如果在用电源、电量>75%、显示百分比，则 关闭显示百分比。

ThenActions.Text: tell application "System Events"	tell application process "SystemUIServer"		set bettaryIcon to first menu bar item of menu bar 1 whose description starts with "电池"		click bettaryIcon		click (the first menu item of menu 1 of bettaryIcon whose name = "显示百分比")	end tellend tell

tell application "System Events"	tell application process "SystemUIServer"		set bettaryIcon to first menu bar item of menu bar 1 whose description starts with "电池"		click bettaryIcon		click (the first menu item of menu 1 of bettaryIcon whose name = "显示百分比")	end tellend tell
